newsitem.title: GHANA: Ghana stock exchange edges up, volume low.
newsitem.headline: Ghana stock exchange edges up, volume low.

text.p: The Ghana stock exchange index ended higher on Wednesday, but volume remained low and most shares were unchanged from the previous session on Monday.
Mechanical Lloyd Co gained five cedis to 95, while Pioneer Tobacco added one cedi to 276, but others were steady.
The GSE all-share index added 0.14 point to 385.14. Volume was a meagre 41,940 shares.
